subject: Television
Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The first two games of the Stanley Cup finals this year will be on NBC, giving the league’s broadcast partner a crack at weekend audiences. Versus will show the next two, and the final three, if necessary, will be on NBC. For the past 10 years, either ESPN or Versus has shown the first two games of the series. cup.
